title: LOL crashes after champ select
body: my husband and I play league together and he can get into league and go to champion select but as soon as it starts to load it tells him that league has crashed PLEASE HELP

replies.body: he has been in the repairing process but it seems like its not progressing any. thank you very much for helping us.

If it's just taking awhile, that's ok be sure to let it finish before closing. It might take awhile to repair if there are missing files, but it also needs to first scan the files for issues. Let the repair finish and test it in a custom/practice match. 

Don't be afraid to hit me back up if nothing seems to work, just make sure to reply to my comment so it alerts me!
that seemed to have worked!!!!!! thank you very much
okay thank you very much. I will be sure to let you know.

My first thought is that some of those game files might be missing or corrupted so the game can't launch correctly. Try having him run a quick repair through the client options and let me know if that helps.
